short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Savyor to set target price for the product you like and receive notice when price drops. Saving is that easy with Savyor!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Savyor allows you to set desired price for products you like but not quite ready to pay the full listing price. You can specify a tracking period, and will receive price change notification when the price drops to their set target within the tracking window they set. This is not just another price tracker. We will provide more data-driven insight to help you make smart shopping decision!!

To use Savyor is easy: 
1) download and install the Savyor extension; sign up if you are first time user
2) shop at the retailers as you normally would
3) click the Savyor icon in the product page to set target price and track period
4) receive notification for price drop, out-of-stock, or back-in-stock

More supporting retailers are added as we grow each day.
